name: Deep Magic 4 Realms
description:
Dive into the deep realm of Deep Magic and begin exploring a mystery of connected portals, hiding terrible and evil monsters. Collect spells and powers (WIP) as you progress through the darkest realms, and inevitably face the most powerful and dangerous of all foes in each of Deep Magic's 4 realms.

donate: https://ssjstash.net/donate

discord: https://ssjstash.net/discord
